D

Dagger - Class in items.weapons
This class of Weapon represents the damage a character would do when equipped with only the barest minimum of gear.
Dagger() - Constructor for class items.weapons.Dagger
The base constructor of the Dagger class sets its damage (dmg) to 2 and its name to "dagger".
dead - Variable in class entities.Entity
 
defaultName - Static variable in class entities.characters.Char
 
defaultName - Static variable in class entities.monsters.Goblin
 
defaultName - Static variable in class entities.monsters.Orc
 
defaultRun() - Static method in class opcode.EncounterHandler
This method runs an encounter containing a new Char and new Orc object.
defaultStats - Static variable in class entities.characters.Char
 
defense() - Method in class entities.Entity
Looks for and returns the defense stat of the entity.
DefensePotion - Class in items.consumables
This class of Consumable is a Defense Potion, an item common to many RPGs.
DefensePotion() - Constructor for class items.consumables.DefensePotion
The base constructor of the DefensePotion class sets the buffedStat variable to "defense", sets the mod stat to 5, sets the duration stat to 5, and sets the name of the item to "defense potion".
die(ArrayList<Entity>) - Method in class entities.characters.AbstractChar
This method checks if the AbstractChar is dead already, and if it is not it removes the AbstractChar from the encounter ArrayList.
die(ArrayList<Entity>) - Method in class entities.Entity
This method removes the entity from combat in a way that differs depending on if it is a character or monster/NPC.
die(ArrayList<Entity>) - Method in class entities.monsters.Monster
 
dying - Variable in class entities.Entity
